import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './About.css'; function About() { function getAge() { var timeNow = new Date(); var age = timeNow.getFullYear() - 1999; return age; } return (

About Me

I'm Le Tang Co and ReactJS Web Developer

I am {getAge()} years old and a student at University of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City, majoring in Information Systems. I joined 2 months as an intern at an Information Technology company with a passion for Web programming and wanted to learn, improve knowledge, and exchange with friends everywhere.

{/* Personal Info */}

Birthday: August 16, 1999

Age: {getAge()}

Email: letangco@gmail.com

Phone: (+84) 332.858.127

University: Information Technology

Freelance: Available

City: Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam

Languages: VietNamese, English

) } export default About;
